list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a square piece of cloth or paper used at a meal to wipe the fingers or lips and to protect garments, or to serve food on.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she unfolded her napkin and put it on her lap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô mở khăn ăn và đặt nó lên đùi cô
